content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you're interested in what social activities we have at EPAM, you're welcome to have a look at this presentation about \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"black\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"FUN DRIVE EPAM\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" or visit our\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"black\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"black\"}}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://sharepoint.epam.com/WFA/FunDriveEPAM/SitePages/Home.aspx\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"site\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" and have FUN and DRIVE with us!\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"black\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"iframe\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/ae749122-24cb-4fcc-8bdb-337f114f99c7/FUN%20DRIVE%20NEW_Mar_2016.pdf?preview=true\",\"style\":{\"height\":\"800px\"}},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
